thread.title: FBI followed protocol in Rob Porter background check: Wray

title: FBI followed protocol in Rob Porter background check: Wray
text:
FBI followed protocol in Rob Porter background check: Wray 5:23pm GMT - 01:23 
FBI Director Christopher Wray said the FBI had followed protocol in performing background checks for a security clearance in the case of former White House staff secretary Rob Porter, who resigned last week amid allegations of domestic abuse by two former wives. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
